body_content.explanation: in ice hockey, lacrosse, and some other sports, a situation in which one team has more players than the other because that team has had one or more players temporarily sent off:
examples: It's hard to get a flow going when 40 of the 60 minutes are power plays.
I expect him to help our power play and become a mainstay in our offense.

body_content.explanation: a situation in which a person or organization tries to get an advantage by showing that they are more powerful than another:
examples: Republicans view the change as a power play by Democrats.
There may be a bit of power play going on here.
